reviewText: This was the "son" of Space Music. It is a musical video extravaganza that captures some of the great historical moments in space travel. My favorite is the recitation of genesis while Apollo 8 was is orbit around the moon. It was the predecessor to "The Voyager Odyssey" which Time-Life's editorial board voted "The Sixth Best Documentary Ever Made" (See The Greatest Movies Ever Made) now published by Time Warner. This will get your kids interested in the romance of space, one that may stay with them the rest of their lives.
